entity.description: Monthly fiscal calendar of an organization. A span of time during which the financial activities of an organization are calculated.

attributes.name: userfiscalcalendarid
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the monthly fiscal calendar.

attributes.name: salespersonid
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the associated salesperson.

attributes.name: fiscalperiodtype
attributes.description: Type of fiscal period used in the sales quota.

attributes.name: effectiveon
attributes.description: Date and time when the monthly fiscal calendar sales quota takes effect.

attributes.name: month1
attributes.description: Sales quota for the first month in the fiscal year.

attributes.name: month2
attributes.description: Sales quota for the second month in the fiscal year.

attributes.name: month3
attributes.description: Sales quota for the third month in the fiscal year.

attributes.name: month4
attributes.description: Sales quota for the fourth month in the fiscal year.

attributes.name: month5
attributes.description: Sales quota for the fifth month in the fiscal year.

attributes.name: month6
attributes.description: Sales quota for the sixth month in the fiscal year.

attributes.name: month7
attributes.description: Sales quota for the seventh month in the fiscal year.

attributes.name: month8
attributes.description: Sales quota for the eighth month in the fiscal year.

attributes.name: month9
attributes.description: Sales quota for the ninth month in the fiscal year.

attributes.name: month10
attributes.description: Sales quota for the tenth month in the fiscal year.

attributes.name: month11
attributes.description: Sales quota for the eleventh month in the fiscal year.

attributes.name: month12
attributes.description: Sales quota for the twelfth month in the fiscal year.

attributes.name: createdby
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the user who created the fiscal calendar.

attributes.name: createdon
attributes.description: Date and time when the quota for the monthly fiscal calendar was modified.

attributes.name: modifiedby
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the user who last modified the quota for the monthly fiscal calendar.

attributes.name: modifiedon
attributes.description: Date and time when the quota for the monthly fiscal calendar was last modified.

attributes.name: transactioncurrencyid
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the currency associated with the monthly fiscal calendar.

attributes.name: timezoneruleversionnumber
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: utcconversiontimezonecode
attributes.description: Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.

attributes.name: exchangerate
attributes.description: Exchange rate for the currency associated with the monthly fiscal calendar with respect to the base currency.

attributes.name: month11_base
attributes.description: Base currency equivalent of the sales quota for the eleventh month in the fiscal year.

attributes.name: month7_base
attributes.description: Base currency equivalent of the sales quota for the seventh month in the fiscal year.

attributes.name: month12_base
attributes.description: Base currency equivalent of the sales quota for the twelfth month in the fiscal year.

attributes.name: month3_base
attributes.description: Base currency equivalent of the sales quota for the third month in the fiscal year.

attributes.name: month4_base
attributes.description: Base currency equivalent of the sales quota for the fourth month in the fiscal year.

attributes.name: month6_base
attributes.description: Base currency equivalent of the sales quota for the sixth month in the fiscal year.

attributes.name: month8_base
attributes.description: Base currency equivalent of the sales quota for the eighth month in the fiscal year.

attributes.name: month5_base
attributes.description: Base currency equivalent of the sales quota for the fifth month in the fiscal year.

attributes.name: month2_base
attributes.description: Base currency equivalent of the sales quota for the second month in the fiscal year.

attributes.name: month1_base
attributes.description: Base currency equivalent of the sales quota for the first month in the fiscal year.

attributes.name: month9_base
attributes.description: Base currency equivalent of the sales quota for the ninth month in the fiscal year.

attributes.name: month10_base
attributes.description: Base currency equivalent of the sales quota for the tenth month in the fiscal year.

attributes.name: createdonbehalfby
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the delegate user who created the monthlyfiscalcalendar.

attributes.name: modifiedonbehalfby
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the delegate user who last modified the monthlyfiscalcalendar.
